features: 【Loom Band Kit】: Uoliloom loom bands kit can make friendship bracelets and jewelry for your children, friends, and family
【Safe and Durablet】: The tools and materials of Uoliloom loom bands are made of safe materials, free of lead and phthalates, you can confidently give it to your child for use

【All-In-One Kit】: This loom band kit comes with all the necessary tools for DIY, including 2900+ loom bands, 100 S buckles, 45 colorful beads, 40 Letter beads, 15 silicone charms, 3 Y weaving tools, 3 weaving needles, 2 hang clasps, 1 introduction and tons of kid-friendly charms and beads

【Sending Your Kids】: Our bracelet kit has a beautiful storage box, and every color and accessory inside will stimulate your child's creativity and imagination. It is the ideal choice to sending your child's on birthday, and our loom band set will accompany your child through a complete childhood.
【Contact Our Team】: If you receive any damaged items or have any questions about loomband kit, please feel free to contact us at any time. Our team will give you a pleased answer within 12 hours.
